name: Ghoul Kid (itch)
description:
Watch our Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D4-3GHiPXe4

In this game you play Ghoul Kid, a lonely ghost that can take control of objects to scare people to death so that you may have friends forever

Ghoul Kid is a game in development by seniors at the University of Utah. Possess household objects to scare visitors out of their wits!

Follow Us on Tumbler: http://ghoulkidgame.tumblr.com/

Follow Us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GhoulKid

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ghoulkidgame

.
